item.title: Apache Mahout Meetup in San Jose
item.description: Apache Mahout Meetup in San Jose # A few hours ago the Mahout Meetup at MapR Technologies in San Jose/CA ended. Two photos taken at the event leaked - happy to be able to publish them here. More information on the discussions and more technical details to follow. Stay tuned.
